sentences.literal: The ancestors of Wei were descendants of Bi Gong Gao.
Bi Gong Gao shared the same surname with Zhou.

sentences.chinese: 武王之伐紂，而高封於畢，於是為畢姓。
sentences.literal: When Wu Wang attacked Zhou, Gao was enfeoffed at Bi, thus becoming the Bi surname.

sentences.chinese: 其後絕封，為庶人，或在中國，或在夷狄。
sentences.literal: His descendants lost their enfeoffment and became commoners, some in the central states, some among the barbarians.

sentences.chinese: 其苗裔曰畢萬，事晉獻公。
sentences.literal: His descendant was called Bi Wan and served Jin Xian Gong.

sentences.chinese: 獻公之十六年，趙夙為御，畢萬為右，以伐霍、耿、魏，滅之。
sentences.literal: In Xian Gong's sixteenth year, Zhao Su was charioteer and Bi Wan was guard. They attacked Huo, Geng, and Wei, extinguishing them.

sentences.chinese: 以耿封趙夙，以魏封畢萬，為大夫。
sentences.literal: Zhao Su was enfeoffed with Geng, Bi Wan was enfeoffed with Wei, and made a grand master.

sentences.chinese: 以是始賞，天開之矣，天子曰兆民，諸侯曰萬民。
sentences.literal: With this beginning of reward, heaven has opened it. The Son of Heaven is called 'myriad people,' feudal lords 'ten thousand people.'

sentences.chinese: 初，畢萬卜事晉，遇屯之比。
sentences.literal: Initially, when Bi Wan divined about serving Jin, he encountered Tun of Bi.

sentences.chinese: 畢萬封十一年，晉獻公卒，四子爭更立，晉亂。
sentences.literal: Eleven years after Bi Wan was enfeoffed, Jin Xian Gong died. Four sons contended to be established. Jin was in chaos.

sentences.chinese: 而畢萬之世彌大，從其國名為魏氏。
sentences.literal: Bi Wan's generation became increasingly great. From his state's name, they became the Wei clan.
He gave birth to Wu Zi.

sentences.chinese: 魏武子以魏諸子事晉公子重耳。
sentences.literal: Wei Wu Zi, along with the various sons of Wei, served Jin prince Chong Er.

sentences.chinese: 晉獻公之二十一年，武子從重耳出亡。
sentences.literal: In Jin Xian Gong's twenty-first year, Wu Zi followed Chong Er into exile.
